# File generated by Wizard 2.2205.6 on Oct 9, 2025.

platform Su34_1 Su-34
#TODO: Terrible way of doing this, but quick way to fire
track platform global_ibcs_battalion_eoc end_track
   execute at_interval_of 1 s  
   if (WsfSimulation.FindPlatform("global_ibcs_battalion_eoc").IsValid())
         if ((PLATFORM.Longitude() < $<RED_WRL_LON:15>$) && PLATFORM.SlantRangeTo(WsfSimulation.FindPlatform("global_ibcs_battalion_eoc")) < 80000){
            PLATFORM.Weapon("glide").Fire(PLATFORM.MasterTrackList().TrackEntry(0));
            PLATFORM.Comment("GLIDE BOMB RELEASED");
            }
            #PLATFORM.Weapon("aam").FireAtLocation(WsfSimulation.FindPlatform("global_ibcs_battalion_eoc").Location());
   end_execute
end_platform

platform POI_1 POI
position 54.6n 15e
altitude 30000 ft
end_platform

platform POI_2 POI
position 52n 15e
altitude 30000 ft
end_platform

platform_type POI WSF_PLATFORM 
side blue
indestructible 
end_platform_type

execute at_interval_of 1 s 
         WsfDraw drawWRL = WsfDraw();
         drawWRL.SetColor(1,0,0);
         drawWRL.SetDuration(100);
         drawWRL.BeginLines();
         drawWRL.Vertex(WsfSimulation.FindPlatform("POI_1"));
         drawWRL.Vertex(WsfSimulation.FindPlatform("POI_2"));
         drawWRL.End();
end_execute
